name: Hell's Quandary
description:
*WARNING!*

This is an Early Pre-Alpha Build with bug. This game will be subjected to change!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Spacebar - Jump

Left Mouse Click - Shoot

Mouse Wheel  Up/Down - Switch weapons

E - Interact with Items

Q - Activate Item

KNOWN BUGS:

Boss room may not appear!

Sometimes the game likes to spawn more enemies then its supposed too!
